Strategic Genius.text: Once per battle, your general can use two different comman abilities in the same hero phase, or can use the Inspiring Presence command ability twice in the same hero phase.

Inspiring.text: You can re=roll battleshock tests for friendly Order units that are within 24" of your general, rather than only 12".

Reckless.text: You can re-roll run and charge rolls for your general, and all friendly Order units within 10" of your general.

Tenacious.text: Add 1 to your general's Wounds characteristic.
